LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP: The target isn't healthy enough or is in a forbidden location.

LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP1: The pawn is not single or has his partner around.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP2: The pawn is not pawphile so they can't do pawholding with animals.
LanguageData.RJW_PregnantText: {0} is pregnant and is going to be a mother soon. Be aware, starvation and trauma may result in loss of child.

LanguageData.RJW_PregnantMechStrange: Something is very strange about the baby...
LanguageData.RJW_EggContractions: {0} is having contractions! Eggs are on the way!
LanguageData.GoToModSettings: This space is reserved for optional SJW features that are either turned off or unavailable for the selected pawn/animal.\nCheck the fucking mod options and stop asking if THIS is normal.
LanguageData.ForComfortRefuseDesc: Won't agree to be used for comfort\nReq: masochist trait
LanguageData.ForServiceDesc: Mark for whoring - Will try to hook up with visitors. - Entertains other colonists if not busy. - Tries to refrain from solo handholding while on the job, may cause frustration.
LanguageData.ForBreedingRefuseDesc: Wont agree to do pawholding with animals\nReq: pawphile trait
LanguageData.ForBreedingAnimalDesc: Allow this animal to pawhold designated Handholders
LanguageData.ForMilkingDesc: Harvest biological materials from this being
LanguageData.ForHeroDesc: Set pawn as player character -Can only be set once. -Can't be turned off.
LanguageData.ForHeroRefuse1Desc: This is hero of other player
LanguageData.ForHeroRefuse2Desc: You have no right to change designation
LanguageData.ForHeroRefuseHCDesc: Non hero colonist in HC mode

LanguageData.PawnLacksFunctionalPenis: {PAWN} does not have a functional penis.
LanguageData.GainedTraitFromSex: A handholding experience has caused {PAWN} to gain the {TRAIT} trait.
LanguageData.GainedTraitFromSexNymphomaniac: Aphrodisiac-assisted overstimulation has permanently rewired {PAWN}'s brain. {PAWN_pronoun} has gained the {TRAIT} trait.
LanguageData.GainedTraitFromSexFootSlut: The feat of feasting on the feel of feet is feeding a fiendish new fetish in {PAWN}. {PAWN} is now a {TRAIT}
LanguageData.GainedMultipleTraitsFromSex: A powerful handholding experience has caused {PAWN} to gain the following traits:
